rev.comment: rv fair use images via WP:NFCC; no fair use in discographies
rev.diff:
Line 1: Line 1: â
[[Image:PointerSistersBreakOut.jpg|thumb|250px|right|The Pointer Sisters on the cover of their landmark [[1983]] album, ''[[Break Out (Pointer Sisters album)|Break Out]]''. The album yielded four top ten U.S. hits and sold over three million copies alone in America making it the family vocal group's most successful album to date.]]
  â  
This is a listing of all the singles and albums released by legendary family [[girl group]] the [[Pointer Sisters]]. The Pointers made fifteen trips to [[Billboard]]'s top forty singles chart with a total of twenty-seven singles registered altogether on the [[Billboard Hot 100]], and thirty registered on [[Billboard]]'s Hot Soul/Black/R&B Singles Chart. Seven of those singles reached the top ten singles chart on the Hot 100 and five of those hit the top five.
This is a listing of all the singles and albums released by legendary family [[girl group]] the [[Pointer Sisters]]. The Pointers made fifteen trips to [[Billboard]]'s top forty singles chart with a total of twenty-seven singles registered altogether on the [[Billboard Hot 100]], and thirty registered on [[Billboard]]'s Hot Soul/Black/R&B Singles Chart. Seven of those singles reached the top ten singles chart on the Hot 100 and five of those hit the top five.
